JOB DESCRIPTION:
Job Description:   

  As an experienced software developer you will be engaged in a wide range of projects in the Brussels office and at customers\' sites. You will work independently or as part of a team in the development,  maintenance and management of all sorts of customized applications. 

  -  You analyze and assess the functional and technical needs of the client\'s specific requests 

  -  You take care of all or part of the developments of this type of request 

  -  You manage your schedule independently 

  -  You maintain a strong relationship with our clients by your professional advice 

  -  You will monitor the projects supervised by a Project Manager 

  -  5 years of experience in Lotus Notes development projects and 2- 3 years in web based Java programming.  

  -  Experience in operational support of applications is a plus. 

  -  Communicative,  proactive,  customer oriented and has a good team spirit 

  -  Excellent English both spoken/writing skills. 

  -  Analytical mind and are curious about new technologies 

  -  Well organized and know how to manage your priorities 

  -  Strong teaming attitude
